PO activity was measured as described<sup>1</sup>, with modifications.

Incubate purified hemocyanin with proteases in 50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.3, containing 0.05 M NaCl, at 20 ˚C for 10 min. 
  2.
Add PAMPs \(pathogen-associated molecular patterns eg: LPS or LTA) dissolved in the same buffer.

  4.  Immediately after the addition of the substrate, continuously monitor the absorbance at 405 nm using a microplate reader \(Molecular Devices, USA).
